title: Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
description: When viewing the Update Test Suite dialog in the application, there are several issues with the labels. Currently, the label 'Test Classes to be included' is written as 'TestClasses' without a space. Additionally, the status line incorrectly refers to methods being selected instead of types. Finally, the action name is written as 'TestSuite' instead of 'Test Suite'. These labeling issues need to be fixed to ensure clarity and consistency in the user interface.
EB: The label 'Test Classes to be included' should be written as 'Test Classes' with a space. The status line should refer to types being selected instead of methods. The action name should be written as 'Test Suite' instead of 'TestSuite'.
SR: Fix the labeling issues in the Update Test Suite dialog. Specifically, update the label 'Test Classes to be included' to be written as 'Test Classes' with a space, correct the status line to refer to types being selected, and change the action name to 'Test Suite' instead of 'TestSuite'.
